Espa√±ol: - Y los que se dicen comunistas, son qu√©?* 
- Algunos son meros t√≠teres est√∫pidos e inconscientes, otros son c√≥mplices corruptos de los par√°sitos.

English: * - And those who call themselves communists, are what?* 
- Some are mere stupid and unconscious puppets, others are corrupt accomplices of parasites. 
* - Mmmmm!*
- The idea was to give the impression to the population that they were two groups, to fake a dispute, you know?
*- Clear.*
 One group pretended to be right-wing and the other left-wing. But in fact both were thieves and accomplices in the implantation of communism in the country. And the old conception that power is like a violin..
* - Violin?*
- Yeah, hold with your left and play with your right.
* - Ahh! Just like our media! The bosses always "right-wing", but always hiring only "left-wing" journalists.*
- Exactly! 

- Oh, my god, what the hell! It's a real nightmare to live in a country like this. Are you sure there is no other way out!*

* "THERE IS, BUT WOULD YOU SUPPORT IT?"*

--- Maur√≠cio Erthal


Spectacular, very worth reading. üáßüá∑
